title: Norton Motorcycles to ride in six models over three years
description: British bike maker Norton Motorcycles, under TVS Motor Company, announced plans to launch six new products in the next three years, targeting increased sales through global partners. TVS Motor commits 200 million pounds for new product development and facilities. Ex-Manchester United CEO Richard Arnold joins as Executive Director. Norton prepares for international expansion, focusing on the US, Germany, France, Italy, and India. CEO Dr. Robert Hentschel highlights investments in R&D for future success.
